name: SOC 2 Type II
description: AICPA Trust Services Criteria for Security, Availability, Confidentiality, Processing Integrity, and Privacy

domains.name: Common Criteria
domains.description: Control environment, communication, risk assessment, monitoring, control activities, logical/physical access, system operations, change management

controls.title: Demonstrates commitment to integrity and ethical values
controls.description: The entity demonstrates a commitment to integrity and ethical values through standards of conduct, evaluation of adherence, and addressing deviations.

controls.title: Board exercises oversight responsibility
controls.description: The board of directors demonstrates independence from management and exercises oversight of the development and performance of internal control.

controls.title: Management establishes structure, authority, and responsibility
controls.description: Management establishes, with board oversight, structures, reporting lines, and appropriate authorities and responsibilities in the pursuit of objectives.

controls.title: Demonstrates commitment to competence
controls.description: The entity demonstrates a commitment to attract, develop, and retain competent individuals in alignment with objectives.

controls.title: Holds individuals accountable
controls.description: The entity holds individuals accountable for their internal control responsibilities in the pursuit of objectives.

controls.title: Obtains or generates relevant information
controls.description: The entity obtains or generates and uses relevant, quality information to support the functioning of internal control.

controls.title: Communicates internal control information internally
controls.description: The entity internally communicates information, including objectives and responsibilities for internal control.

controls.title: Communicates with external parties
controls.description: The entity communicates with external parties regarding matters affecting the functioning of internal control.

controls.title: Specifies suitable objectives
controls.description: The entity specifies objectives with sufficient clarity to enable the identification and assessment of risks relating to objectives.

controls.title: Identifies and analyzes risk
controls.description: The entity identifies risks to the achievement of its objectives across the entity and analyzes risks as a basis for determining how the risks should be managed.

controls.title: Considers fraud risk
controls.description: The entity considers the potential for fraud in assessing risks to the achievement of objectives.

controls.title: Identifies and assesses changes
controls.description: The entity identifies and assesses changes that could significantly impact the system of internal control.

controls.title: Selects and develops monitoring activities
controls.description: The entity selects, develops, and performs ongoing and/or separate evaluations to ascertain whether the components of internal control are present and functioning.

controls.title: Evaluates and communicates deficiencies
controls.description: The entity evaluates and communicates internal control deficiencies in a timely manner to those parties responsible for taking corrective action.

controls.title: Selects and develops control activities
controls.description: The entity selects and develops control activities that contribute to the mitigation of risks to the achievement of objectives to acceptable levels.

controls.title: Selects and develops technology controls
controls.description: The entity also selects and develops general control activities over technology to support the achievement of objectives.

controls.title: Deploys through policies and procedures
controls.description: The entity deploys control activities through policies that establish what is expected and procedures that put policies into action.

controls.title: Implements logical access security
controls.description: The entity implements logical access security software, infrastructure, and architectures over protected information assets.

controls.title: Controls access credentials
controls.description: Prior to issuing system credentials and granting system access, the entity registers and authorizes new internal and external users.

controls.title: Manages access removal
controls.description: The entity authorizes, modifies, or removes access to data, software, functions, and other protected information assets based on roles.

controls.title: Restricts physical access
controls.description: The entity restricts physical access to facilities and protected information assets to authorized personnel.

controls.title: Manages access to protected assets
controls.description: The entity discontinues logical and physical protections over physical assets only after the ability to read or recover data and software has been diminished.

controls.title: Manages security threats and vulnerabilities
controls.description: The entity implements controls to prevent or detect and act upon the introduction of unauthorized or malicious software.

controls.title: Manages transmission security
controls.description: The entity restricts the transmission, movement, and removal of information to authorized internal and external users and processes.

controls.title: Controls system boundaries
controls.description: The entity implements controls to prevent or detect and act upon the introduction of unauthorized or malicious software via system boundaries.

controls.title: Manages system changes
controls.description: The entity uses a defined change management process for changes to infrastructure, data, software, and procedures.

controls.title: Monitors system components
controls.description: The entity monitors system components and the operation of those components for anomalies that are indicative of malicious acts.

controls.title: Evaluates security events
controls.description: The entity evaluates security events to determine whether they could or have resulted in a failure to meet objectives.

controls.title: Responds to security incidents
controls.description: The entity responds to identified security incidents by executing a defined incident response program.

controls.title: Recovers from security incidents
controls.description: The entity identifies, develops, and implements activities to recover from identified security incidents.

controls.title: Manages changes to infrastructure and software
controls.description: The entity authorizes, designs, develops or acquires, configures, documents, tests, approves, and implements changes.

controls.title: Identifies and manages risk from vendors
controls.description: The entity identifies, selects, and manages activities from vendors and business partners to achieve objectives.

controls.title: Manages risk from business disruptions
controls.description: The entity assesses and manages risks associated with vendors and business partner relationships.

controls.title: Manages system capacity
controls.description: The entity maintains, monitors, and evaluates current processing capacity and use of system components.

controls.title: Manages environmental protections
controls.description: The entity authorizes, designs, develops or acquires, implements, operates, approves, maintains, and monitors environmental protections.

controls.title: Manages recovery operations
controls.description: The entity tests recovery plan procedures supporting system recovery to meet its objectives.

controls.title: Identifies confidential information
controls.description: The entity identifies and maintains confidential information to meet the entity's objectives related to confidentiality.

controls.title: Disposes of confidential information
controls.description: The entity disposes of confidential information to meet the entity's objectives related to confidentiality.

controls.title: Defines processing specifications
controls.description: The entity defines processing objectives, processing tolerances, and output specifications.

controls.title: Monitors processing quality
controls.description: The entity implements policies and procedures over system processing to ensure completeness, accuracy, and timeliness.

controls.title: Maintains processing records
controls.description: The entity implements policies and procedures to store inputs, items in processing, and outputs to meet processing integrity objectives.

controls.title: Handles processing errors
controls.description: The entity implements policies and procedures to handle errors and exceptions in processing.

controls.title: Controls system inputs and outputs
controls.description: The entity implements policies and procedures to validate the completeness and accuracy of inputs and outputs.
